site.name: Mohamed Ali Mabrouki
site.description: Euro 7 braking, WVTA dossiers, and wheel-end launches orchestrated for Toyota, Stellantis, and Renault programmes.

hero.headline: Bring compliant multi-brand vans to market on schedule.
hero.lead: I synchronise regulatory dossiers, brake-by-wire integration, and wheel-end industrialisation so Toyota, Stellantis, and Renault programmes move from concept freeze to SOP without surprises.
bullets: Recovered multi-brand WVTA dossiers with zero rework across Toyota, Peugeot, Citroën, and Opel derivatives.
Align Euro 7 brake-by-wire roadmaps, particulate compliance, and redundancy validation across supplier stacks.
Secure wheel-end launch readiness: torque/runout analytics, PPAP maturity, and supplier control plans.

skills.title: Skills
skills.intro: Delivery pillars that keep regulation, braking, and industrial tracks aligned.

categories.title: Type Approval Leadership
categories.description: WVTA strategy, annex evidence, VIN/CoC governance, and authority engagement.

categories.title: Euro 7 Brake Delivery
categories.description: Brake-by-wire integration, particulate analytics, diagnostics, and redundancy coverage.

categories.title: Wheel-End Industrialisation
categories.description: Axles, hubs, bearings, torque/runout analytics, and supplier readiness.

categories.title: Programme Governance
categories.description: Cross-brand steering cadence, KPI burn-down, and digital collaboration tooling.

projects_section.title: Projects
projects_section.intro: Featured case studies across homologation, braking, and chassis launch.

experience.title: Experience
experience.intro: Programme leadership across OEM and supplier networks.

details: Recovered K9 WVTA dossiers spanning Toyota, Peugeot, Citroën, and Opel vans.
Built compliance dashboards linking annex evidence, VIN schemas, and CoC population.
Chaired joint UTAC/CNRV cadence securing approvals without timing slips.
Industrialised Gen3 hub-bearing and axle modules with torque/runout analytics.
Ran supplier war rooms covering PPAP, CoP, and process capability.
Institutionalised wheel-end launch playbook adopted across alliance plants.
Delivered homologation and braking due diligence for investment committees.
Facilitated executive sprints translating compliance gaps into funded plans.
Stood up cross-functional tooling for traceability and KPI reporting.

about.title: About
about.body: Mohamed Ali Mabrouki is an automotive programme leader specialising in type approval, Euro 7 braking, and chassis industrialisation. From dossier strategy to supplier war rooms, he keeps homologation, engineering, and production teams shipping on schedule.

cv_downloads.title: CV & Downloads
cv_downloads.intro: Access the detailed CV or request a tailored dossier.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Share your homologation, braking, or chassis brief — expect a reply within one business day.

cv_page.title: Curriculum Vitae
cv_page.summary: Automotive programme leader aligning Euro 7 braking, WVTA dossiers, and wheel-end industrialisation for multi-brand commercial vehicles.

competencies.title: Homologation strategy
competencies.body: WVTA annexes, VIN/CoC governance, authority engagement (UTAC, CNRV, RDW).

competencies.title: Euro 7 brake-by-wire
competencies.body: Continental MK C2, Bosch ESP10 integration, particulate analytics, redundancy validation.

competencies.title: Industrialisation
competencies.body: Wheel-end launches, PPAP/CoP, run@rate, torque/runout analytics, supplier war rooms.

competencies.title: Programme governance
competencies.body: Cross-functional sprint cadence, KPI dashboards, risk burn-down, executive gateway prep.

experience.title: Programme Leader — Toyota Motor Europe
items: Recovered K9 WVTA dossiers, restoring annex sign-off cadence across Toyota and Stellantis brands.
Stood up compliance dashboards covering VIN schemas, CoC population, and evidence status.
Coordinated UTAC / CNRV workshops to remove homologation blockers without timing slips.

experience.title: Chassis Engineering Lead — Renault Group
items: Industrialised Gen3 hub-bearing for Renault Master with torque/runout analytics and supplier war room.
Deployed SPC dashboards linking process capability to launch gating for axle and wheel-end suppliers.
Created audit playbook adopted across alliance plants for wheel-end launch containment.

experience.title: Consulting & Advisory
items: Delivered braking, chassis, and homologation due diligence for investors assessing Tier-1 assets.
Moderated executive workshops translating compliance risks into action plans and KPI sets.
